name: Escape Area-51
description:
Game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

You need to play in FULL SCREEN for the game to work properly

It's a really small game it should only take about 5 minutes to complete.
Move - A and D
Jump - SPACE

Activate Power - Q

Use power - LEFT MOUSE and RIGHT MOUSE

Credits:
Character Sprites - https://vimlark.itch.io/

Music - https://opengameart.org/users/bart
